title: Textile, 1920s
description: Polychrome block print on orange ground. Large pink and white roses with green-blue leaves and tan leaves. Motif repeats in a one-half drop reverse. Pattern matches when selvages placed side to side. Condition: soiled; lower left corner missing. Black "J" stamped on selvage; color dots.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920s.
1920s. printed cotton. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-117.
